verse: नावेदविन्मनुते तं बृहन्तं नाब्रह्मवित्परमं प्रैति धाम। विष्णुक्रान्तं वासुदेवं विजानन्विप्रो विप्रत्वं गच्छते तत्त्वदर्शी ॥

terms.अवेदवित्: one who does not know the Vedas (scriptures)
terms.अब्रह्मवित्: one who is not a knower of Brahman (the ultimate reality)
terms.विष्णुक्रान्तम्: the one who is beyond the reach of Vishnu
terms.वासुदेवम्: (the one who is) Lord Vasudeva (an incarnation of Lord Vishnu)
terms.विप्रत्वम्: the state of being a wise person

meaning: Translation:One who does not know the Vedas cannot understand the supreme Lord, nor can they attain the highest state. By realizing and understanding the one who is beyond the reach of Vishnu, Lord Vasudeva, the wise person attains the state of being truly knowledgeable, the knower of the truth.
